explanation: Tracy claims she was covering the front desk until 1 PM. But Clue 3 shows the photocopier logged a copy job at 12:52 PM under Tracy's employee code — and the posted list is a photocopy of the original. Clue 2 confirms only Brenda and Tracy know the filing cabinet code, so Tracy had access. Clue 1 narrows the window to between 12:15 PM and 1:10 PM. Tracy stepped away from the front desk, opened the cabinet, copied the list, and pinned it to the bulletin board before 1 PM.
funFact: Office Secret Santa exchanges date back to the early 1900s and the average American spends about $25 per gift — though some offices have no spending limit at all.
